message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item that represents the amount of profit retained after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, the "Net Profit" line in the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section represents this value. This is the profit after all expenses including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization have been deducted.

From the given problem, I can see that the Net Profit value is 111731.83 on 2024-02-03.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '111731.83'}}
```
